subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: In every lead processing area there must be not less than 14 m3 of air space for each person employed therein, and in the calculation of such space the maximum height taken must be not greater than 4.2 m.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The total floor space for the persons employed in such area, exclusive of space used for storage, must be not less than 3.3 m2 for each person so employed.
